metadata.description: Respiratory reflexes balancing airway stretch, gas levels, and ventilatory drive.
metadata.notes: Enumerates qualitative breathing reflex controllers without duplicating biomimetic respiratory kernels.

hering_breuer.stimulus: Lung inflation stretching pulmonary stretch receptors.
hering_breuer.afferent: Vagal slowly adapting receptors to nucleus tractus solitarius.
hering_breuer.effector: Termination of inspiration and facilitation of expiration.

central_chemoreceptor.stimulus: Elevated CO2 and decreased pH in cerebrospinal fluid.
central_chemoreceptor.integration: Respiratory rhythm generators increasing inspiratory drive.
central_chemoreceptor.efferent: Phrenic and accessory respiratory motor outputs.
central_chemoreceptor.effector: Augmented tidal volume and respiratory rate.

peripheral_chemoreceptor.stimulus: Hypoxemia detected by carotid and aortic bodies.
peripheral_chemoreceptor.afferent: Glossopharyngeal and vagal afferents to nucleus tractus solitarius.
peripheral_chemoreceptor.integration: Medullary respiratory centers enhancing inspiratory and expiratory drive.
peripheral_chemoreceptor.efferent: Respiratory motor neurons and sympathetic pathways to increase ventilation.
peripheral_chemoreceptor.effector: Accelerated ventilation with associated sympathetic activation.
